43178.affected_area: Moose Jaw (Crescent View, Windsor Park, Mooscana, Fairview)
live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43178.summary: Some customers in Crescent View, Windsor Park, Mooscana, Fairview areas of Moose Jaw are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43178.title: Oct 20 - Moose Jaw (Crescent View, Windsor Park, Mooscana, Fairview) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43228.summary: Some customers in the South area of Killarney in Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
